title: FF_RSE Function Block
description:
FF_RSE an edge-triggered RS fip-fop. The output Q is set by a rising edge
of CS and cleared by a rising edge on CR. If both edges (CS and CR) rise at
the same time, the output is set to FALSE. An asynchronous reset input
RST sets the output at any time to FALSE.
name: FF_RSE

input.name: CS
input.description: Clock signal input, triggers a transition on the rising edge.

input.name: CR
input.description: Reset signal input, sets the output Q to FALSE on the rising edge.

input.name: RST
input.description: Asynchronous reset signal to set output Q to FALSE immediately.

output.name: Q
output.description: Output signal representing the state of the flip-flop (TRUE or FALSE).
